item.title: A Fistful of Death
item.description: A Fistful of Death is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Demofilo Fidani and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: One Damned Day at Dawn… Django Meets Sartana!
item.description: One Damned Day at Dawn… Django Meets Sartana! is a 1970 spaghetti western directed by Demofilo Fidani.

item.title: Sugar Colt
item.description: Sugar Colt is a 1966 Italian and Spanish spaghetti western directed by Franco Giraldi, produced by Franco Cittadini and Stenio Fiorentini, written by Sandro Continenza, Augusto Finocchi, Giuseppe Mangione and Fernando Di Leo, composed by Luis Enríquez Bacalov, filmed by Alejandro Ulloa and starred by Jack Betts, Joaquín Parra, Soledad Miranda, Georges Rigaud, Antonio Padilla, Giuliano Raffaelli and Hunt Powers. It is the Giraldi's second film after Seven Guns for the MacGregors. The film represents the cinematographical debut for Jack Betts, here credited as Hunt Powers, and it is also Erno Crisa's last film.

item.title: ... and called it the Holy Spirit
item.description: He Was Called Holy Ghost is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western-comedy film written and directed by Roberto Mauri and starring Vassili Karis. It was followed by Return of the Holy Ghost (1972), still directed by Mauri and with Karis in the title role.

item.title: Dead Men Don't Make Shadows
item.description: Dead Men Don't Make Shadows, aka Stranger That Kneels Beside the Shadow of a Corpse is a 1970 spaghetti western directed by Demofilo Fidani.

item.title: A Barrel Full of Dollars
item.description: A Barrel Full of Dollars also known as Coffin Full of Dollars is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Demofilo Fidani and starring Jack Betts.

item.title: Halleluja for Django
item.description: La più grande rapina del West is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Maurizio Lucidi.

item.title: Adios Companeros
item.description: Adios Companeros ist ein Italowestern von Demofilo Fidani. Alternativtitel sind "Ich will Deinen Kopf" und "Ich will ihn tot".

item.title: Quel maledetto giorno d’inverno
item.description: Quel maledetto giorno d’inverno ist ein im deutschsprachigen Raum nicht gezeigter Italowestern, den Demofilo Fidani preisgünstig 1970 inszenierte.

item.title: …E lo chiamarono Spirito Santo
item.description: …E lo chiamarono Spirito Santo ist ein 1971 von Roberto Mauri gedrehter Italowestern, der im deutschen Sprachraum nicht aufgeführt wurde.
